pr_title: #18177 fix for the jsp when the title is not being set, used the iden…

timeline.message: #18177 fix for the jsp when the title is not being set, used the identifier instead
#18177 now the title is a non overridable field, in addition all title logic has been moved to the getTitle and the ContentletAPI.getName is just calling content.getTitle instead
#18177 fixes to handle the title set on the checkin, if the title  has not been set, it is not calculated
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:dotCMS/core into issue-18177-title-issue
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:dotCMS/core into issue-18177-title-issue

timeline.bodyText: why did you remove this method?
timeline.author: nollymar

replies.bodyText: we redesign the logic; not the getTitle is final. No body can override it. This is to avoid weird behaviour such as the contentlets modified here, that the title generating didn't follow the dotCMS logic
replies.author: jdotcms

timeline.author: nollymar
nollymar

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid unused imports such as 'org.junit.Assert.assertNull'
